description: Whip up these teriyaki pork meatballs in 20 minutes flat. Serve over steamed rice with stir-fried ginger, carrot, snow peas and sesame seeds.
name: Teriyaki Pork Meatballs With Sesame & Ginger Veg Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 2 tsp oil in a medium saucepan over high heat. Add rice and cook for 30 seconds, stirring, or until coated. Add 2 cups water and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to mediumlow and simmer, covered, for 12 minutes or until water has evaporated and rice is tender.

Meanwhile, heat 2 tsp oil in a large frying pan over mediumhigh heat. Cook meatballs for 8 minutes, turning, or until cooked through. Add stir-fry sauce, stir to coat, then bring to the boil. Remove pan from heat. Transfer mixture to a plate and cover to keep warm.

Heat remaining oil in same cleaned pan over mediumhigh heat. Cook ginger for 30 seconds, stirring, or until fragrant. Add carrot, snow peas, half each of the sesame seeds and onion, then cook for 2 minutes, stirring, or until snow peas are just tender.
Divide rice, carrot mixture, meatballs and sauce among bowls. Serve scattered with remaining sesame seeds and onion.
